name: Portfolio_Rockford_Green_Microsuede_SoFast_Sofa
reviews: Just what I was looking for, a basic nice looking sofa! Great sofa for the price! It matches my living room perfectly, it's a beautiful olive green. Very happy with my purchase!
Went together well and the only problem was it needed to be picked up at UPS
This couch was delivered very quickly and was so easy to assemble. A++!

First couch ordered went missing for 5 days then was shipped back without being delivered because it was so damaged. This box arrived in terrible condition, torn, patched and barely held together with tape in many places but surprisingly the couch was fine. Went together very easily and is firm but comfortable. Nice material, looks more brown than green but quite attractive.

Appears to be comprised of sturdy materials. Glad that there are no springs to break or wear out. Nice color and fabric. Density of foam cushions seems to be of good quality. Pretty simple to put together, but took some time.
description: The Portfolio Home Furnishings Rockford SoFast sofa is covered in a durable and stain resistant olive green suede fabric. The stylish Rockford sofa features rolled welted and flared arms as well as 8 layers of comfort seating.Our Handy Lock no tool feature makes assembly a breeze - just click and slide togetherAssembles in less than 2 minutesPart of the Portfolio Furniture CollectionBetter materials and engineering are the hallmark of this SoFast sofaSofa features 8 layers of comfort seating-Layer 1 is fabric, Layer 2 is polyester fiber for comfort, Layer 3 is a soft layer of polyurethane foam for comfort, Layer 4 is a firm layer of foam for support, Layer 5 features wrapped pocket coils for individual comfort, Layer 6 is densified fiber to insulate springs, Layer 7 is polyester woven fabric and Layer 8 is sinuous springs for a personalized seating experienceAll steel seat and back decks for strength and durabilityDark espresso all wood tapered legsPolyester hollow fill fiber back cushionsHardwood arm framesEco-friendly and efficient product design uses less fossil fuel based components in construction and deliveryVariouscomponents are recyclable at the end of usePatent pendingMaterials: Polyester microsuede, Steel, HardwoodFinish: Dark espressoUpholstery color: Olive greenUpholstery fill: Pocketed coil core with layers of foam and fiberSeat dimensions: 20 inches high x 68.5 inches wide x 21 inches deepSofa dimensions: 36.5 inches high x 84 inches wide x 33.5 inches deepArm height: 27.5 inches highFurniture Pattern: SolidType: SofaStyle: Transitional, TraditionalMaterial: PolyesterAssembly: Assembly RequiredExact Color: OliveColor: GreenStyleTraditional, TransitionalMaterialMicrosuede, Polyester, Steel, WoodTypeSofaAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorGreenFurniture PatternSolid
